infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: MapAlert needs your location to show your position on the map and calculate distance to your destination.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: MapAlert needs background location access to alert you when you're approaching your destination.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow MapAlert to use your location to alert you when approaching your destination.
plugins.locationAlwaysPermission: Allow MapAlert to use your location in the background to alert you when approaching your destination.
plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow MapAlert to use your location to show your position on the map.
